name: Android Release with APK Upload

on:
  workflow_dispatch: {}   # manual trigger
  push:
    branches:
      - main              # auto-release when pushing to main

permissions:
  contents: write   # ğŸ‘ˆ needed for pushing tags & creating release

jobs:
  version:
    name: Generate Next Tag
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    outputs:
      new_tag: ${{ steps.bump.outputs.new_tag }}

    steps:
      - name: ğŸ“¥ Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          fetch-depth: 0   # ğŸ‘ˆ fetch all tags

      - name: ğŸ·ï¸ Get latest tag
        id: get_latest
        run: |
          tag=$(git tag --sort=-v:refname | head -n 1)
          echo "latest_tag=$tag" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT

      - name: ğŸ”¢ Bump patch version
        id: bump
        run: |
          latest="${{ steps.get_latest.outputs.latest_tag }}"
          if [ -z "$latest" ]; then
            new_tag="v1.0.0"
          else
            prefix="v"
            version="${latest#$prefix}"
            major=$(echo $version | cut -d. -f1)
            minor=$(echo $version | cut -d. -f2)
            patch=$(echo $version | cut -d. -f3)
            patch=$((patch+1))
            new_tag="v$major.$minor.$patch"
          fi
          echo "new_tag=$new_tag" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT

      - name: ğŸ·ï¸ Create and push new tag
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
        run: |
          git config user.name "github-actions"
          git config user.email "github-actions@github.com"
          git tag ${{ steps.bump.outputs.new_tag }}
          git push https://x-access-token:${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/${{ github.repository }} ${{ steps.bump.outputs.new_tag }}

  build:
    name: Build Release APK
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: version
    permissions:
      contents: write

    steps:
      - name: ğŸ“¥ Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: â˜• Setup JDK
        uses: actions/setup-java@v4
        with:
          distribution: temurin
          java-version: 17
          cache: gradle

      - name: ğŸ”¨ Build Release APK
        run: ./gradlew assembleRelease

      - name: ğŸ“¦ Upload APK as Artifact
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: release-apk
          path: app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk

  release:
    name: Create GitHub Release
    needs: [version, build]
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: write

    steps:
      - name: ğŸ“¥ Download APK Artifact
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: release-apk
          path: .

      - name: ğŸš€ Create GitHub Release with APK
        uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v2
        with:
          tag_name: ${{ needs.version.outputs.new_tag }}
          files: app-release.apk
